about_the_game:
Get Ready to BOUNCE!

JUMP INTO THE COLORFUL WORLD OF BOUNCY ESCAPE!

Run, jump, and outpace other players across multiple game modes – what will you choose? Parkour Race? Sumo battles? Soccer? Or maybe a special time-limited? Play locally or online with up to four players. Get ready! the countdown begins in 3...2...1...

UPGRADE AND STAND OUT AMONG OTHER PLAYERS

Win a round? Earn coins! Use them in the shop to buy double jumps and get even better than your opponents... Or maybe you'd rather use emojis to express your feelings to other players?

PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY

It's up to you how you want to play – locally with split-screen or ONLINE with friends or other players? You can create a private lobby for invited players only, or join a public lobby to compete against players from around the world!

ENDLESS ADVENTURE

We’ve got lots of game modes and maps for you, so the fun never gets boring... Which map will you be the best at?

ENDLESS RUN (local)

How many platforms can you jump across? This endless, randomly generated world will test you! Choose the game type that suits you best... mysterious boosters that increase your character? Or maybe you want to challenge yourself in the timed mode and see how many platforms you can jump in a set time? It's time to decide! 

BOUNCY RACE (local & online)

3...2...1... Who will reach the finish line first? On this floating map, anyone can fall into the void... Will you overcome all the obstacles and cross the finish line?

SUMO (local & online)
Time is ticking... and the platform is shrinking! Will you manage to knock off all the players and become the Sumo King? There can only be one winner!"

GOAL RUSH (local & online)

Everyone loves sports... two nets, two teams, and one ball! Which team will score more and win the football showdown?

EVENT (online)

A limited-time mode that appears from time to time! Climb higher before the lava level catches up with you... Can you avoid falling objects from the sky? Will you manage to get through the laser maze? No one really knows what the next event will bring!

Get Ready to BOUNCE!

JUMP INTO THE COLORFUL WORLD OF BOUNCY ESCAPE!

Run, jump, and outpace other players across multiple game modes – what will you choose? Parkour Race? Sumo battles? Soccer? Or maybe a special time-limited? Play locally or online with up to four players. Get ready! the countdown begins in 3...2...1...

name: Bouncy Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260 | AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Jump into action with Bouncy Escape! Experience colorful, dynamic gameplay solo or with friends—up to 4 players. Customize your game, collect coins and XP, and compete against players worldwide. Are you ready to become the ultimate jump champion?
